original_title: UFC Fight Night  139:  Korean Zombie vs Rodriguez
overview: UFC Fight Night  139:  Korean Zombie vs Rodriguez was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that was held on November 10, 2018 at Pepsi Center in Denver, Colorado, United States. A featherweight bout between former UFC Featherweight Championship challenger Chan Sung Jung and Yair Rodríguez served as the event headliner.
title: UFC Fight Night  139:  Korean Zombie vs Rodriguez
